title: Welcome Home At Vista Del Lago!! Ready To Move In, Our 2x2 Call Now!
posting_body: Welcome Home to Vista Del Lago community!!

Our gorgeous, move-in ready homes offer well-equipped kitchens with all electric appliances, double-paned windows neatly dressed in vertical blinds, extended vanities, awesome closet space, and an abundance of space throughout the home.
Additionally, each home includes A/C and heating and provides extra space for lounging in private and semi-private patios/balconies.

Vista Del Lago is conveniently located near retail shopping center in the West Field Mall- Valley Fair, and favorite grocery stores such as Safeway, Furthermore, you will be pleased with the professional, friendly, and quality service that Vista Del Lago Leasing Office and Maintenance staff provides.
Our spacious One-bedroom unit a cozy fireplace, cool remote control air conditioning and all electric appliances.
With over-sized closets you will have more than enough space to settle into your new home.
* Easy Access to Highways 280, Close to Saratoga Avenue & Stevens Creek Blvd.
* Beautiful Landscaped Grounds with Water Features
* Laundry Facilities with Smart Phone Technology
Call for a tour with us today at show
for more details or to schedule a tour OR check out our sister properties at <URL>
